import React from "react"; import { Button, Container, Grid, TextField, Typography } from "@mui/material"; import { Box, styled } from "@mui/system"; import ArrowRightAltIcon from "@mui/icons-material/ArrowRightAlt"; import MiniImage1 from "../../assets/img/home/mini_station1.png"; import MiniImage2 from "../../assets/img/home/mini_station2.png"; import MiniImage3 from "../../assets/img/home/phone_battery2.png"; import ContactUsImage from "../../assets/img/home/phone_battery1.png"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import Partners from "../../views/Home/Partners"; import Header from "../../components/Header"; import Main from "./Main"; const Item = styled(Box)(({ theme }) => ({ padding: theme.spacing(2), textAlign: "center", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", })); const StyledTextField = styled(TextField)(({ theme }) => ({ div: { borderRadius: 0, border: "0px", }, })); function Home() { return ( <>
WHY US? 1 사용하기 너무나 간편하고 쉽다 2 예쁜 Design Perfect 사이즈 3 Free 설치 OR 수익분배 Contact Us
); } export default Home;
